About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 11 Easy One-Dish Pork Chop Dinners A hearty, one-pot pork dinner is the way to go. By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on April 13, 2023 Close Credits: Doug These one-pot pork chop meals hit the dinner trifecta: They're complete meals that are easy to make, delicious to eat, and easy to clean up. These top-rated pork chop recipes give you loads of variety, too. So you can change it up from week to week. 01 of 12 Pork Chops with Apples, Onions, and Sweet Potatoes View Recipe Save Photo by Rebekah Rose Hills. "This is so easy, so good, and so versatile," says Ashbeth. "I've used pork chops with and without bones, pork loin, and pork roast. You can sprinkle the brown sugar, salt, and pepper on the different layers or all at the end, as mentioned in the recipe. Play around with the brown sugar and spices to your taste." 02 of 12 German Pork Chops and Sauerkraut View Recipe Save Pork Chops and Sauerkraut. Photo: Diana Rattray Savory-sweet pork chops are baked in a large skillet with sauerkraut, apple, and brown sugar in this easy and hearty German-inspired dish. "Excellent recipe! Easy and delicious," raves Georgia. "I used Bavarian sauerkraut which already has the caraway seeds in it." 03 of 12 Pork Chops Italiano View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine "The only thing I did was added a little bit more seasoning since my family likes their food spicy but, other than that, I followed the recipe exactly," says reviewer Elsie. "It's been added to my recipe box for future use. The chops are juicy and tender...try it!" 04 of 12 Pork Chops with Garden Rice View Recipe Save "AWESOME!" raves Brenda. "My family gave this one-dish pork chop meal thumbs up and want it again. It was so easy to prepare and had all "good" healthy stuff in it. I did my cleaning up while it was in the oven and was all done." 05 of 12 Easy and Delicious Mexican Pork Chops View Recipe Save Photo by Allrecipes . Pork chops bake up nice and tender in a bed of Mexican-style rice. "Really tasty for almost no effort," says Sandy. "One of the best quick-make recipes I've tried." 06 of 12 Grandmother's Pork Chop Dinner View Recipe Save fabeveryday This is home-style cooking at its simplest. Pork chops are simmered with crispy bacon, onion, and potatoes for an easy one-skillet supper. "This is truly 'comfort food,'" says Ginny. "A simple, old-school skillet meal that warms the tummy and makes you smile." 07 of 12 Pork Chops with Creamy Scalloped Potatoes View Recipe Save Photo by Joey Joan. Pork chops bake up tender with creamy scalloped potatoes with a touch of thyme and Dijon mustard. "What a great comfort food recipe,' says Elizabeth. "Fantastic flavors and easy to make." 08 of 12 Fennel-Rubbed Pork Chops with Apple, Kale, and Sweet Potato View Recipe Save Doug This easy, all-in-one skillet dinner features apples, kale, and sweet potato cooked with fennel-rubbed pork chops. Jonagold or Honeycrisp would both work well in this recipe. "Loved this meal!" raves SufficientGrace. "Very healthy as well as tasty! The ground fennel and pepper add a wonderful background taste." 09 of 12 Mexican Pork Chop Casserole View Recipe Save thedailygourmet Here's an easy-to-prep, flavorful Mexican-inspired pork-chop dinner with Spanish rice and bell peppers. 10 of 12 Sticky Garlic Pork Chops View Recipe Save "It's always the simplest recipes that blast the tastebuds, and this one is doesn't disappoint," says home cook Misterblutarsky. "I made a single chop and used the exact ingredients, measuring by eyeball. I always keep a small bottle of fish sauce in my fridge, and you should too. It offers a flavor that nothing else can replicate." 11 of 12 Pork Chops with Oniony Mashed Potatoes and Cider Gravy View Recipe Save Here's one for the pressure cooker. "Caramelized onions really boost the flavor in the mashed potatoes, and you can't go wrong with a gravy that has apple cider and Dijon mustard!" says LauraF. 12 of 12 More Inspiration Top-Rated Pulled Pork Recipes for Sandwiches, Salads, and More Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking One-Pot Meal Recipes Was this page helpful?
